content: Help stop the Iraq war Sign the petition to stop the war in Iraq Please go onto: PLAY IN TRAFFIC Click on General Talk, and then stop Iraq war, and type your name to enter the petition. Thank you Together we will make a difference. Any peace loving person striving for world peace would want to Stop The Iraq War. So please help and join! We call on the President to call our troops home. 2008 is waiting on a miracle and this may be one of them. We should bring our troops home! This message has been edited. Last edited by: <NEMESIS1960>, Thu 19 March 2009 09:45 AM
